statements: SELECT * FROM activity_logs
SELECT user_id, query_text FROM activity_logs WHERE user_id = 123
SELECT log_id, timestamp FROM activity_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT query_type FROM activity_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM activity_logs
SELECT * FROM activity_logs WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, query_text FROM activity_logs WHERE query_type = 'SELECT' LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT query_text, COUNT(*) AS num_queries FROM activity_logs GROUP BY query_text HAVING num_queries > 2 ORDER BY num_queries DESC;
SELECT user_id, count(*) AS total_queries FROM activity_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_queries DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, MAX(timestamp) AS last_query_time FROM activity_logs GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM database_activity_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, user_id, activity_type FROM database_activity_logs WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT timestamp, query_text FROM database_activity_logs WHERE activity_type = 'login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp, activity_type FROM database_activity_logs WHERE query_text LIKE '%error%' AND activity_type LIKE 'query%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activities WHERE detected_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT id, timestamp, user_id, activity_type, query_text FROM database_activity_logs WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT activity_id, detected_at, description FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_id IN (SELECT id FROM database_activity_logs WHERE user_id = 456);
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS activity_count FROM database_activity_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, activity_type FROM database_activity_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY user_id, activity_type;

SELECT user_id, SUM(CASE WHEN activity_type = 'query' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS query_count, SUM(CASE WHEN activity_type = 'login' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS login_count FROM database_activity_logs GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM sql_activity_logs;
SELECT user_id, activity_description FROM activity_suspicious_logs WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, activity_description FROM sql_activity_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activity_alerts ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT alert_id, alert_message FROM suspicious_activity_alerts WHERE alert_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM sql_activity_logs WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, activity_description FROM activity_suspicious_logs WHERE log_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS activity_count FROM sql_activity_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING activity_count > 10;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activity_alerts WHERE alert_timestamp <= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY alert_timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(timestamp) AS last_activity FROM sql_activity_logs GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY last_activity DESC;
SELECT * FROM logs LIMIT 10;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, user_id FROM logs WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role = 'admin' AND email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT log_id, query FROM logs WHERE query IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 5, 7) ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM logs WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT log_id, user_id, timestamp, query FROM logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_id > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;

SELECT logs.log_id, users.username, suspicious_activities.activity_description FROM logs JOIN users ON logs.user_id = users.user_id JOIN suspicious_activities ON logs.log_id = suspicious_activities.log_id;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT log_id, user_id, query FROM ActivityLogs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM SuspiciousActivities WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT user_id, action, COUNT(*) as total_actions FROM DetectedActivities GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_actions DESC;
SELECT * FROM ActivityLogs WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as log_count FROM ActivityLogs GROUP BY user_id HAVING log_count > 5;
SELECT user_id, query FROM ActivityLogs WHERE action = 'search' AND query LIKE '%tutorial%' ORDER BY log_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT a.log_id, a.timestamp, u.username FROM ActivityLogs a JOIN Users u ON a.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.role = 'admin' ORDER BY a.timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM SuspiciousActivities WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
